meta.name: generator
meta.content: MODX file generated with PP MODX Creator by tumba25 (online version)

header.title: Share On
header.description:
With Share On MOD, users can share the topics in the following social networks: - Facebook - Twitter - Digg - Reddit - Orkut - Delicious - VK - Tuenti - Sonico - Friendfeed - Tumblr - Google+ - MySpace
You can follow the development through the repository: http://goo.gl/zGvsP
header.author-notes: If you want to contribute to the development of this MOD, consider making a donation visiting: http://goo.gl/erGPa

changelog.change: [Fix] Problem taking the url of the post
[Add] Share for Not Loged in users (Only for Prosilver)
[Fix] Problem with Orkut Images (Thanks to karot)
[Fix] Problem with image tuenti in subsilver2
